summary: A neural network module that forms the central processing stage of the CogVideoX architecture, applying a configurable stack of residual layers to 3‑D feature maps. It integrates time‑step embeddings, dropout, group or spatial normalization, and a swish activation to refine spatial‑temporal representations before passing them onward in the model.
business_intent: Provides a flexible and efficient building block for AI‑driven video synthesis and enhancement systems, supporting high‑quality content generation and manipulation in media creation platforms.
